title: Calories in McDonald's Fudge Sundae
meta_description: Discover calories in mcdonalds fudge sundae, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, protein, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.

quick_answer.text: One McDonald's fudge sundae contains about 330 calories and 7 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a McDonald's fudge sundae?
faqs.a: Approximately 330 calories for one standard serving.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in McDonald's fudge sundae?
faqs.a: About 56 g total carbs, including 43 g sugars and 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is the McDonald's fudge sundae high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, it has 43 g of sugars, mostly from the soft serve and fudge.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a McDonald's fudge sundae?
faqs.a: 9 g total fat, with 5 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Does McDonald's fudge sundae have trans fat?
faqs.a: 0 g trans fat in the standard recipe.
